title: Trade, Hong Kong & 2020
itunes:title: Trade, Hong Kong & 2020
description:
Kevin spoke with Joel Rubin, Democratic strategist and former deputy assistant secretary of state and Anna Edgerton, Bloomberg Congress Editor.

They discussed impeachment, Israel, a trade deal with China, Hong Kong and the 2020 presidential elections.

Kevin also spoke with Brian Hook, Special Representative for Iran.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
